Description:
Great Value Beach House!
Located close to beautiful Red Rocks beach is this quaint home with a great holiday feel to it. The home comprises a central open plan kitchen, dining and living area, three good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom combined laundry including a bath with a shower over. A sliding door from the living area opens onto the north facing balcony which is a perfect place to relax after a day at the beach. This great value property boasts a spacious yard offering plenty of potential to extend the home at your leisure. It would make an ideal holiday home in this fabulous location.
Additional features include split system heating and cooling and a dishwasher
Insights: 43 Scenic Drive, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Walk to the beach, Walk to town
Positioned within easy walking distance to the beach and main street this great sized home is perfect for holiday or permanent living.
Featuring 4 generous bedrooms, a large light filled open plan living area opening onto a sunny covered deck. The master bedroom has the convenience of a semi ensuite plus a main bathroom down stairs and separate toilet.
Add to this a huge shed and carport with access to the good sized low maintenance rear yard.
Inspection a must.

Description:
5 Bedrooms - Bring The Whole Family!
Have you been looking for a home in a great central location? Situated in a quiet street, only a short walk to all the of the main street's cafes and restaurants and north facing beaches is this 5 bedroom, 2 bathroom home.
Split level in design, over three levels it features, 2 separate living areas - the upper level consisting of spacious kitchen and dining - which opens out to a north facing decking (with delightful distant bay glimpses), perfect for summer barbeques.
The home also features split system heating and cooling on both the upper and lower floors.
The 596sqm approx. block has a fully fenced rear yard, and offers low maintenance gardens, plenty of room for parking of boats caravans etc.
The property would be appealing for either permanent, holiday or as an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
Arrange your inspection today!
This property in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Walk To Everything!
With a central Cowes location and pristine presentation, this is your opportunity to secure a great investment / lifestyle, double storey townhouse being sold fully furnished and only a short stroll to the magnificent north facing beach and shopping precinct. This brilliantly positioned townhouse allows you to do away with the car and explore the shops, restaurants, bars and amenities at your leisure.
The spacious light-filled lower level of the home features an open plan living, kitchen and dining area with a sliding door opening onto an undercover outdoor deck and courtyard garden, as well as a separate guest powder room and internal access to the single garage.
The second level of this immaculate townhouse includes a second comfortable lounge/living area with access to a north facing private terrace, huge dual access bathroom including corner spa, separate shower and double basin vanity and two bedrooms both with built in robes.
Additional inclusions of this great property include two split system heating/cooling units, dishwasher, single garage with laundry and access to the courtyard, fully fenced. Currently operating as a holiday rental, the choice is yours to either use as a fabulous low maintenance holiday getaway or a permanent home.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Your Very Own Resort In The Heart of Cowes!
Have you been searching for that perfect holiday escape, within 1 hour and 45 mins from Melbourne? Look no further. This immaculate 4 bedroom home in central Cowes, is the perfect Phillip Island getaway!
Currently used as a successful holiday investment for the current owners, the property offers great returns. However this home is not just suited for holiday investment purposes, it is so well equipped and located that it would also make a fabulous permanent home. Walking distance to schools, shops, and the north facing Cowes beach, and offering all the features you would look for to accommodate permanent living.
This double storey home has been extremely well designed, and offers ground floor living, kitchen and master bedroom, with ensuite and walk in robe, as well as laundry and a separate powder room, which would be attractive for families or people looking to retire.
There are 2 living spaces, one up and one down, creating great separate spaces for families or guests.
The outdoor areas have been cleverly planned, and incorporate 3 different deck areas, and a large solar heated / self cleaning inground pool, perfect for outdoor entertaining. The north facing rear yard capturing all the essential sunshine for year round use.
There is also a double garage with internal access, garden shed, plenty of room for caravan or boat parking, and situated on a large 707sqm approx. low maintenance allotment.
62 Katherine Circuit, Cowes is the complete package, Inspection is sure to impress!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Red Rocks Beach Cottage
This charming coastal home boasting fabulous features and a superb relaxed environment is situated in the desirable Red Rocks locale with the beach just a leisurely stroll away. The appealing property comprises a gorgeous coastal cottage plus a separate one bedroom studio. The home itself offers two bedrooms both with built in robes, polished timber floors throughout and high ceilings complimenting the spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining space. The kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel cooking appliances, plenty of storage and bench space and easy access to either a sheltered alfresco area or the verandah, suitable for any season. The studio comprises a bedroom and a separate toilet and has direct access to the covered outdoor area. A private and beautifully landscaped garden featuring a fabulous peppercorn tree provides shade on hot summer days.
The character filled property on a good size allotment of approximately 603 square metres will appeal to those looking for either a permanent or holiday home within walking distance to the beach.
Additional features include: a double lock up garage with one remote control door providing great storage, split system heating and cooling, 900mm wide gas cooktop, fully fenced
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
Magnificent views,double block.
Spread over three levels, this 48 square (approx.) home consists of four bedrooms, including huge master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, home office, magnificent family dining area plus a formal dining area and a total of three living areas.
There is a great outdoor deck which is set amongst the tree tops and takes in the magnificent views of the bay. Full bistro blinds provide a great entertainment zone for all weather conditions. Additional features include double carport, single car garage, 8.5 x 4 m boat shed, rainwater tanks, solar hot water, three air conditioning units plus a gas heater.
Leased to an executive company for the last eight years this home presents an ideal investment opportunity or suitable for permanent living.
Only a stone's throw to the beach and central Cowes and situated on a 1600m2 allotment inspection of this wonderful property will impress you.

Description:
Soon to be titled Seagrove lot - Opposite parkland
This soon to be titled block of land is perfectly positioned fronting parkland in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 703 square metre (approx.) block is due to title early 2020.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:

Description:
COWES HAVEN WALK TO THE SHOPS AND BEACH
This is a charming townhouse close to Cowes central and a short walk to a great stretch of shops and the famous Cowes north facing beach. A great place to sit back, relax and enjoy all that Phillip Island has to offer. The downstairs area offers an open living plan that gives you a sense of space with a modern kitchen, large bedroom and bathroom and a great outdoor undercover entertaining area for BBQs and enjoying the summer evenings. Access is also gained by the single garage. Upstairs offers a large double bedroom and second living or 3rd bedroom with a second bathroom. Cooling/heating on both floors.

Description:
Everything at your fingertips!
Occupying the ultimate position, right in the heart of Cowes is this recently refurbished single level residence.
Consisting of an open plan living, kitchen and dining area, three bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with a built in and walk in robe along with the ensuite.
Offering a host of other great features which includes polished timber floors, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, induction cooking, split system heating and cooling units, ceiling fans, fabulous north facing undercover entertaining area, carport and a single garage.
All of this is set within a 641sqm approx. fenced allotment and currently has a tenancy in place.
The local shops, cafes, primary schools, doctors and beaches are within easy reach!
Whether you are looking to invest or permanently reside, you can't go wrong with this property's desirable location!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
HILLTOP LUXURY, SOPHISTICATION AND LIFESTYLE
A home of this calibre is a rare find. Boasting sheer opulence in every direction, this low maintenance high quality residence is perfect for Families or Holiday makers who know quality.
Custom designed with bespoke living in mind, every square inch has been carefully considered by the owner in this 3 bedroom/2.5 bathroom, west facing home. Meticulous finish and jam packed with so many features, a full list of the highest spec finishing's will be provided to you at the private inspection.
A spacious floor plan with multiple sun drenched living zones spanning across both levels creates a relaxed, low maintenance modern lifestyle. Conveniently located at the entrance to the home you will find a Premium personal lift making this Multi-Level living suitable for all ages.
You will find a well-appointed Master bedroom and ensuite on the upper floor and also a fully integrated showpiece kitchen that is complete with premium appliances, induction cooking and abundant storage.
Located down the hall you will find a powder room and a spacious office, a great location to work from home and to pay the bills apart from power with your own solar system array of 30 Panels!
This expansive open plan living, kitchen and dining all open to the fully enclosed alfresco that takes in the panoramic north/west facing water views. The addition of a private home theatre with projector and surround sound complement this home to make it the ideal entertainer's home.
Downstairs you will find the 2 additional bedrooms, large family bathroom and the second kitchenette located in the additional lounge. This opens onto the 100% genuine timber decked alfresco with commercial gas heaters, ceiling fans, outdoor tv and to finish it off, automated shutters for both summer and winter.
Fully enclosed wrap around courtyard includes premium low maintenance landscaping where you can enjoy a lifestyle that provides seamless indoor-outdoor living/entertaining all year round.
Apart from the main residence you will find the oversized double car garage with additional boat/caravan storage and the stand-alone second cottage.
The renovated cottage offers a space for friends, family or guests with everything in mind.
The fully self-contained 1 bedroom/bath and spacious kitchen will let your visitors enjoy a holiday while offering a relaxing quiet space.
Only a short stroll to Cowes main street and beaches this home is in the ideal position so come and see it for yourself, you will fall in love.
Call Alex Scott & Staff Cowes today to arrange your private inspection 5952 5633
Insights: 5 TALOFA AVENUE, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
The Ultimate In Stylish Living
This immaculately presented double storey coastal residence of surprising spaces boasts generous indoor and outdoor living and entertaining areas complemented by beautiful tropical landscaped gardens creating an enviable lifestyle!
The lower level comprises a spacious open plan living, dining and kitchenette area, with beautiful floor tiles throughout, flows seamlessly between two fabulous outdoor entertaining spaces, perfect to sit back and relax with family and friends whilst taking in the gorgeous surrounds. Also on this level are two generous sized bedrooms, a family bathroom with a spa bath, laundry, under stair storage and direct access to the double remote garage.
A fabulous light filled stairwell leads up to a very spacious open plan main living, dining and kitchen area, with lovely polished timber floors throughout, which leads onto an expansive north facing covered entertaining deck. The exquisite gourmet kitchen features a 900mm gas cooktop, an electric double oven and microwave, dishwasher, pull out pantry and gorgeous stone benchtops with waterfall ends. The master bedroom features it's own study nook, a walk through robe, stylish dual access ensuite with walk in shower and double vanity and a separate toilet.
Some of the many wonderful features of this immaculate home include: new carpet and blinds throughout, ducted vacuum system, stunning Tasmanian Oak flooring, two split system heating/cooling units, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, stainless steel appliances, garden shed
This exceptional home, set on a 603sqm approx fully fenced allotment and walking distance to the amazing north facing bay beach and shops is perfectly tailored for relaxed permanent living or dual family escapes. Inspection is a must!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Immaculate & Ideally located
Spend your summer strolling to the beach or enjoying the local cafes and restaurants from this impressive home. Situated in a popular & sought after location this stylish home offers three good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk in robe, two bathrooms plus a powder room. Modern kitchen with grey mirrored LED backlit, splashback and stainless steel appliances.
Spacious open plan living & dining room flowing out onto the tiled entertaining area through bi-fold doors.
This property presents the perfect lifestyle opportunity with its low maintenance artificial lawns surrounding the property including edible organic garden.
Fully fenced with double garage and a security system that can be operated and monitored via smart phone application.... relax and enjoy the "Island life" from the tranquil surrounds of this immaculate property.

Description:
TIMELESS DESIGN AND LOCATION WITH BIG BLUE WATER VIEWS ON 2500m2 (approx.)
Long regarded as one of Phillip Islands best locations, The Red Rocks beach area captures the feeling and reminds us of why we choose to live on Phillip Island.
This solid brick property is located on the corner of Appley Ave. and Dafydd St. Cowes and situated on a large double allotment of approx. 2500m2. This is a beautiful place and just set back from the beach with big blue water views overlooking your native garden. This property has been lovingly built and maintained in perfect condition and ready for the next chapter to be written and the 1st time offered in many years.
Features include, Ground floor: formal entry with a large rumpus room with tiled slate floors, cosy wood heater, 3rd bedroom, laundry room and 2nd bathroom.
You can access your property out of the weather by the large garage.
Upstairs: offers 2 extra living zones one with polished timber floors in the 1st living area and formal dining area, and the 2nd living area is designed to take advantage of the incredible water views with a large north facing living area and private balcony giving you a feeling of being in the tree tops. Each living area offers a solid wood heater. The open plan kitchen and situated just off the 1st lounge room and dining area with a further 2 bedrooms and a bathroom are located on this level.
All this is set on large double allotment with subdivision potential (STCA).
A further double carport plus a 3 car garage also compliment this beautiful home.
This property is big enough for your family and friends to enjoy those summer bbq's and set amongst an established native garden and only a few doors from the beach, your search ends here. Inspection will confirm.

Description:
Quiet court location
This immaculate brick veneer home must be inspected to be truly appreciated. Situated in a quiet court location yet walking distance to the beach, shops, Primary school and golf course you will find everything you need at your doorstep.
The home offers four carpeted bedrooms, two bathrooms with additional separate toilet and main bathroom with extra large shower. The formal lounge features a cathedral ceiling and slow combustion wood fire which extends through to the dining space and kitchen with commercial Technica, gas cooktops, large fan forced electric oven, built in pantry and plenty of cupboard and storage space. The living areas are tiled throughout and fitted with ceiling fan and split system air conditioning.
Nestled on a large block with neat, established gardens, installed irrigation system and secure backyard. The front and rear verandahs are ideal for relaxing or entertaining with canvas blinds fitted to the windows and clear blinds to the southside.
The attached four car garage with remote rollerdoor has high ceilings to accommodate boat/caravan storage and rear drive through sliding door.
This would make an ideal family home or addition to your investment portfolio.
Enquire now!
